quest: ⚔️ Brave the perilous grocery store to acquire an ice cream flavour you have never had.

followUps.quest: Build the most delicious looking bowl of ice cream you have ever had in your life.
Sprawl out on your bed/sofa, eat the ice cream while calling a friend to cry. Like one of those old 1970s teenage girls going through a breakup.

quest: Take a photo of the weirdest thing that you can see now

followUps.quest: Physically draw that photo. Don't worry if it's ugly, it is already the weirdest thing you can see anyways
Send your drawing to someone you trust with zero context
